interface.name: NeighbourhoodSizeFunction
interface.javadoc:
Provides the network neighbourhood's size as a function of the number of calls already performed during the learning task. The "neighbourhood" is the set of neurons that can be reached by traversing at most the number of links returned by this function.
$Id: NeighbourhoodSizeFunction.java 1566092 2014-02-08 18:48:29Z tn $
3.3

Computes the neighbourhood size at the current call.
numCall Current step of the training task.
the value of the function at {@code numCall}.
